conclusion: Determine the speed of the bullet relative to the ground.
The speed of the bullet relative to the ground is v_0 - v_1.
The time taken for the bullet to travel distance s is t = s/v_0.
Cart B moves a distance d_B = v_2 * s/v_0 during time t.
The position of the target relative to Cart A must match the position of the bullet relative to Cart A after time t.
The relative speed of the bullet with respect to Cart B is v_0 - v_2.
The relative speed of the bullet with respect to Cart B must equal the speed of Cart B relative to the ground, v_0 - v_2 = v_2.
The speed of the bullet relative to the ground is v_0 = 2v_2.
The speed of the bullet relative to the ground is v_0.
